techmeme.title: Google says it will test removing news articles from EU-based publishers from Search for 1% of users in France, Poland, Greece, Belgium, and other EU countries (Emma Roth/The Verge)
Amazon launches Amazon Haul, a storefront on its app that promises "crazy low prices" on a range of items, to compete with Temu and Shein (Annie Palmer/CNBC)
A US judge rules that Meta must face trial in a US FTC lawsuit seeking its break up over claims that it bought Instagram and WhatsApp to crush competitors (Jody Godoy/Reuters)
In a policy blueprint, OpenAI says the US and its neighbors should form a "North American Compact for AI" to compete with China in talent, financing, and more (Jackie Davalos/Bloomberg)
Sources detail Elon Musk's role in Trump's transition: Mar-a-Lago meetings, calls with world leaders, voicing support for Brendan Carr at the FCC, and more (Theodore Schleifer/New York Times)
